    \multicolumn{1}{p{12.145em}}{OECD Agricultural Market Access Database} & \multicolumn{1}{p{6em}}{Global} & World prices & All commodities & US dollars per mt \\

    \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{2}[2]{*}{SSP database}} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{2}[2]{*}{National}} & Population & —     & Million \\
          &       & GDP   & —     & Billion US dollars \\
    \midrule
    \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{13}[2]{*}{FAOSTAT commodity balances}} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{13}[2]{*}{National}} & Total supply & All commodities & 000 mt \\

          &       & - Harvested area & Crops only & 000 ha \\
          &       & - Yield & Crops and livestock & mt/ha \\
          &       & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} \\
          &       & Total demand & All commodities & 000 mt \\
          &       & - Food demand & All commodities & 000 mt \\

          &       & Stock change & All commodities & 000 mt \\
          &       & Net trade & All commodities & 000 mt \\

    \multicolumn{1}{p{12.145em}}{FAOSTAT} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{3}[2]{*}{National}} & Calorie availability & —     & kcal/person/day \\
    \multicolumn{1}{p{12.145em}}{food supply} &       & Food supply quantity & Food commodities & kilograms/capita/year \\
          &       & Food supply & Food commodities & kcal/commodity/person/day \\

    \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{2}[2]{*}{FAO AquaStat and OECD}} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{\multirow{2}[2]{*}{National}} & Total irrigated area & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} & 000 ha \\
          &       & Irrigated crop area & Crops only & 000 ha \\
    \midrule
    \multicolumn{1}{p{12.145em}}{IFPRI SPAM} & \multicolumn{1}{p{6em}}{FPU (aggregated from pixels)} & By production system (irrigated and rainfed): & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} & \multicolumn{1}{l}{} \\
          &       & - Harvest area & Crops only & 000 ha \\
          &       & - Yield & Crops only & mt/ha \\
          &       & - Production & Crops only & 000 mt \\
    \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}%

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\begin{landscape}
% Table generated by Excel2LaTeX from sheet 'c2'
\begin{table}[htbp]
  \centering
  \caption{Key IMPACT behavioral and scenario parameters and assumptions}
    \begin{tabular}{p{11em}p{11em}p{27.215em}}
    \toprule
    \textbf{Parameter/Assumption} & \textbf{Data source} & \textbf{Explanation} \\
    \midrule
    Demand elasticities (price and income) & USDA and expert opinion & Determine demand responses to changes in prices and income: They have been adjusted over time to reflect changing preferences for high-value goods over staples due to economic growth. In addition, they are calibrated to be consistent with Engle’s Law, where food expenditure falls as a share of total expenditure with economic growth \\
    \midrule
    Supply elasticities & Expert opinion & Determine production response to changes in commodity prices \\
    \midrule
    Marketing margins & OECD and expert opinion & Represent the cost of transporting commodities from the point of production to national and international markets \\
    \midrule
    Producer and consumer support estimates & OECD and expert opinion & Represent subsidies and other national policies that create price wedges between national and international markets \\
    \midrule
    Export taxes and import tariffs & GTAP 7 database & Represent national trade policies and contribute to the price wedge between national and international markets \\
    \midrule
    Exogenous yield growth rates (IPRs) & Expert opinion & Assumptions about how crop and livestock productivity will change over time due to advances in technology. \\
    \midrule
    Population growth rates & SSP database & IMPACT is calibrated to the IIASA SSP 2 (version 3, see \cite{kc2024updating}) population scenario. \\
    \midrule
    GDP growth rates & SSP database & IMPACT is calibrated to the OECD SSP 2 (version 3, see \cite{kc2024updating}) GDP scenario. \\
    \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}%
  \label{tab:assumptions}%
\end{table}%
\end{landscape}

\begin{table}[htbp]
  \centering
  \caption{Standard IMPACT multimarket model outputs}
    \begin{tabular}{p{14.43em}p{10.855em}p{8.93em}p{6.355em}}
    \toprule
    \textbf{IMPACT result} & \textbf{Unit} & \textbf{Geographic scope} & \textbf{Time scope} \\
    \midrule
    \textbf{Prices} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} \\
    \midrule
    World prices & 2005 US\$/mt & Global & Annual \\
    Consumer prices & 2005 US\$/mt & National & Annual \\
    Producer prices & 2005 US\$/mt & National & Annual \\
    \midrule
    \textbf{Supply} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} \\
    \midrule
    Total supply & 000 mt & National, FPU & Annual \\
    Harvest area & 000 ha & National, FPU & Annual \\
    Animal numbers & 000 producing animals & National, FPU & Annual \\
    Yield & mt/ha or mt/animal & National, FPU & Annual \\
    \midrule
    \textbf{Demand} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} \\
    \midrule
    Total demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Food demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Feed demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Intermediate demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Biofuel demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Other demand & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    \midrule
    \textbf{Trade} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} \\
    \midrule
    Net trade & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Net exports & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Net imports & 000 mt & National & Annual \\
    Trade share of production & \%    & National & Annual \\
    Trade share of demand & \%    & National & Annual \\
    \midrule
    \textbf{Food security} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} & \multicolumn{1}{r}{} \\
    \midrule
    Food availability & kilogram/person & National & Annual \\
    Kilocalorie availability & kcal/person/day & National & Every 5 years \\
    Undernourished children & million & National & Every 5 years \\
    Share at risk of hunger & \%    & National & Every 5 years \\
    Population at risk of hunger & million & National & Every 5 years \\
    \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}%
  \label{tab:outputs_std}%
\end{table}%
